Text:
As a christian I find this highly offensive and a gross misrepresentation of the Christian faith. I haven't seen the movie, though if the website
http://www.godhatesfags.com/main/  is anything to go by, I pity these people....
Fred Phelps is an idiot and the worst kind of hatemongers and if anyone is going to "hell" it's him, not the people he so despises...

Another type of low life hate monging scums are the ones that keep spreading links to anti-semitic bullshit nazi-sites. Like the one in this description. 
(Which has nothing to do with this torrent, except that it is written by the same type of person as godhatefags.com)

Sorry about the computer hick-up and wrong link.  This is what I intended to post: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rev._Fred_Phelps

But God does hate fags, in fact he wants 'em all dead. He's not misrepresenting anything, in fact he's simply standing by his christian convictions. He's dangerous alright, make no mistake about that, but religious people usually are.
